column1: Computer and Machine Vision option - Computational and Software Techniques in Engineering (MSc)

This specialist option of theMSc Computational and Software Techniques in Engineeringhas been developed to deliver qualified engineers to the highest standard into the emerging field of digital signal and image processing who are capable of contributing significantly to this increased demand for both real-time and off-line systems operating over a range of mobile, embedded and workstation platforms.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
One year full-time, two-three years part-time
